name: Robert Andrew BARTLETT, Sr., petitioner, v. Frank L. PERRY, Secretary, North Carolina Department of Public Safety.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Robert Andrew BARTLETT, Sr., petitioner,
v.
Frank L. PERRY, Secretary, North Carolina Department of Public Safety.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of North Carolina dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

casebody.head_matter:
Robert Andrew BARTLETT, Sr., petitioner,
v.
Frank L. PERRY, Secretary, North Carolina Department of Public Safety.
No. 14-9032.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 18, 2015.
Opinion
